block.p: PAULINA PORIZKOVA, the model and sometime actress, and RIC OCASEK, former lead singer for the rock group the Cars, have a newborn son.

JONATHAN RAVEN OCASEK, the couple's first child, was born on Nov. 4, at Lenox Hill Hospital in Manhattan; he weighed 8 pounds, 3 ounces, said Jeff Albright, Mr. Ocasek's publicity agent. He said the couple only decided to announce the birth this week after having received many inquiries.
PAULINA PORIZKOVA, the model and sometime actress, and RIC OCASEK, former lead singer for the rock group the Cars, have a newborn son.

JONATHAN RAVEN OCASEK, the couple's first child, was born on Nov. 4, at Lenox Hill Hospital in Manhattan; he weighed 8 pounds, 3 ounces, said Jeff Albright, Mr. Ocasek's publicity agent. He said the couple only decided to announce the birth this week after having received many inquiries.
Ms. Porizkova, 28, and Mr. Ocasek, 44, met in 1984 when she starred in the band's "Drive" music video. They have been married since 1989.
Ms. Porizkova, who was born in the former Czechoslovakia, has been a model for Estee Lauder cosmetics and has appeared in Sports Illustrated magazine's annual swimsuit issues.
She is also the co-author of a children's book, "The Adventures of Ralphie the Roach," which was published last year by Doubleday. So she has at least one well-rehearsed bedtime story ready.
